items.sentence: If you turn here, you can probably avoid a lot of traffic.
I don't think it'll be possible to get this ink stain out.
I did everything the way that we agreed it should be done.
I knew that I shouldn't have done it, but I did it anyway.
I didn't realize what was happening until it was too late.
We have to find out for sure whether Tom was there or not.
Tom didn't seem to be aware that Mary was in the hospital.
I don't mean to rush you, but Tom will be here any minute.
When was the last time that you and Tom hung out together?
Can you guess what the most popular sport in the world is?
He who fights and runs away may live to fight another day.
This ticket is valid for only two days after its purchase.
It's one of the shows I've been meaning to watch with Tom.
Tom showed Mary the tiny piece of metal that he had found.
I can't believe that people think that Tom is intelligent.
The problem is that Tom thinks that he's better than Mary.
Do you think that Tom would like it if I did that for him?
When do you think that Tom is going to want us to do that?
Do you think that it would be possible for Tom to do that?
Do you think that anyone would care if Tom didn't do that?
